…Just 3 months into his term, the results of these policies truly speak  for themselves: Promises made, promises kept.

Honoring the Life of Lieutenant Colonel Boyd ``Buzz'' Wagner

Mr. JOYCE of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to honor World  War II ace pilot and Johnstown native, Lieutenant Colonel Boyd ``Buzz''  Wagner.

Buzz completed his flight…

…America to thrive no  matter what side of the tracks you grow up on or what your education  level is. We want hard work, savings, and investment rewarded.

Mrs. Wagner, Mr. Gottheimer, and Mr. Meeks have delivered that in the  INVEST Act, and I urge a ``yes'' vote.
